6 vector <string> inputs;
7 string name;
8 ros::Publisher pub_pc;
9 string output;
10 pcl::PassThrough<Point> filter_cut;
11 string frame_proc = "cam_center";
12 bool enable_cutting;
13 float y_pose;
14 float width;
15 bool icp = false;
16 
20 void pc_callback(const pcConstPtr& pc1, const pcConstPtr& pc2)
21 {
22  string frame = inputs[0] + "_" + inputs[1] + "_filtered";
23  string pub_frame;
24  tf::StampedTransform transform;
25  tf::StampedTransform transform2;
26  tf::TransformListener tf_listener;
27 
28  pc_t input1 = *pc1;
29  pc_t input2 = *pc2;
30  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Receiving pc1 in " << input1.header.frame_id);
31  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Receiving pc2 in " << input2.header.frame_id);
32  if (icp)
33  {
34  pub_frame = name + "_filtered";
35  }
36  else
37  {
38  ros::param::param<string>("/calib/" + inputs[1] + "/cloud/frame_pub", pub_frame, "world");
39  }
40  // ros::param::param<string>("/calib/" + inputs[0] + "_" + inputs[1] + "/transform_estimation/frame", frame_proc, "cam_center");
41 
42  try
43  {
44  tf_listener.waitForTransform(input1.header.frame_id, frame_proc, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(5.0));
45  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(frame_proc, input1, input1, tf_listener);
46  tf_listener.waitForTransform(input2.header.frame_id, frame_proc, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(5.0));
47  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(frame_proc, input2, input2, tf_listener);
48 
49  tf_listener.waitForTransform(frame, frame_proc, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(5.0));
50  tf_listener.lookupTransform(frame, frame_proc, ros::Time(0), transform);
51  // transform2.setRotation(transform.getRotation());
52  // tf_listener.lookupTransform(frame_proc, frame, ros::Time(0), transform);
53  // transform2.setOrigin(transform.getOrigin());
54  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(input1, input1, transform);
55 
56  if (enable_cutting)
57  {
58  cut(input1, y_pose-width/2, 5);
59  cut(input2, -5, y_pose+width/2);
60  }
61 
62  tf_listener.waitForTransform(pub_frame, frame_proc, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(5.0));
63  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(pub_frame, input1, input1, tf_listener);
64  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(pub_frame, input2, input2, tf_listener);
65  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("pc1 now in " << input1.header.frame_id);
66  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("pc2 now in " << input2.header.frame_id);
67  }
68  catch (tf::TransformException ex)
69  {
70  ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
71  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
72  }
73 
74  ROS_DEBUG("Merging.");
75  pc_t merged;
76  if (icp)
77  {
78  merged = input1;
79  }
80  else
81  {
82  merged = input1 + input2;
83  }
84  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("merged pc in " << merged.header.frame_id);
85  pub_pc.publish(merged);
86 }
87 
88 void conf_callback(calib::MergingConfig &config, uint32_t level)
89 {
90  enable_cutting = config.enable_cutting;
91  y_pose = config.y_pose / 1000;
92  width = config.width / 1000;
93 }
94 
95 void cut(pc_t& input, float ymin, float ymax)
96 {
97  {
98  filter_cut.setInputCloud(pcConstPtr(new pc_t(input)));
99  filter_cut.setFilterFieldName("y");
100  filter_cut.setFilterLimits(ymin, ymax);
101  // filter_cut.setFilterLimitsNegative(true);
102  filter_cut.filter(input);
103  }
104 }
105 
106 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
107 {
108 
109  // parsing arguments
110 
111  inputs.clear();
112 
113  inputs.push_back(argv[1]);
114  if (argv[2] == "icp")
115  {
116  inputs.push_back(inputs[0]);
117  icp = true;
118  name = inputs[0] + "_icp";
119  }
120  else
121  {
122  inputs.push_back(argv[2]);
123  name = inputs[0] + "_" + inputs[1];
124  }
125  output = argv[3];
126  string node_name = "merging_" + output;
127 
128  // Initialize ROS
129  ros::init(argc, argv, node_name);
130  ros::NodeHandle nh;
131  ros::NodeHandle node_merge("/calib/" + name + "/merging");
132 
133  pub_pc = nh.advertise<pc_msg_t>("/calib/clouds/" + output, 1);
134 
135  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::MergingConfig> server(node_merge);
136  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::MergingConfig>::CallbackType f;
137  f = boost::bind(&conf_callback, _1, _2);
138  server.setCallback(f);
139 
140  // Synchronize both kinects messages
141  message_filters::Subscriber<pc_t> cam1_sub(nh, "/calib/clouds/" + inputs[0], 1);
142  message_filters::Subscriber<pc_t> cam2_sub(nh, "/calib/clouds/" + inputs[1], 1);
143  typedef sync_policies::ApproximateTime<pc_t, pc_t> KinectSync;
144  Synchronizer<KinectSync> sync(KinectSync(10), cam1_sub, cam2_sub);
145  sync.registerCallback(boost::bind(&pc_callback, _1, _2));
146 
147 
148  // ROS loop
149  while (ros::ok())
150  {
151  ros::spin();
152  }
153 
154  return 0;
155 }
